txt.en: 'It doesn't feel like it belongs in the Shire, does it? I think it came from Outside, though Bungo disagrees. If you ask him, he'll just tell you that I'm to blame.\n\n'I wouldn't do anything to his pipe-weed! My crop would have beaten his fair n' square. There's something about this terrible stone that tells me honest folk had nothing to do with it.'
Where do you think it came from?
